name: CardStackTrainer
0:
”Alexa, open card stack trainer”
”Alexa, start card stack trainer”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: card stack trainer
des:
This mnemonica stack trainer will test your knowledge of position of cards in mnemonica stack. To use, select "test" as the option.
The skill will then name a playing card to which you will need to respond with a number 1-52 corresponding with the correct position for the named card.
You can say "next" or "skip" to go to another card but it will count as a miss and you will not be able to revisit the card on that round.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
